definition: to drain (factory waste etc)/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce

sentences.english: Being alone is much better than with a prick who studies excrement.
sentences.chinese: 單身總比和研究排泄物的笨蛋在一起好吧。

sentences.english: P63 labels mainly the basal cells of excretory duct.
sentences.chinese: P63蛋白主要標記頜下腺排泄管的基底細胞。

sentences.english: The excretion data in urine were disposed by sigma minus method.
sentences.chinese: 尿藥排泄數據處理採用虧量法。

sentences.english: The excreta of humans and land animals contain soluble refractory organic matter.
sentences.chinese: 人和陸生動物排泄物含有可溶的難處理有機物質。

sentences.english: Probenecid can delay this for the renal excretion.
sentences.chinese: 丙磺舒可延緩本品經腎排泄。

sentences.english: Does excuse me milk add honey to have promote the action that digest and excretes ?
sentences.chinese: 請問牛奶加蜂蜜有促進消化和排泄的作用嗎？

sentences.english: The outer river is a natural river course, whose main function is to drain floods during rainy seasons.
sentences.chinese: 外江是自然河道，其作用是在雨季排泄大量洪水。

sentences.english: If the quality of food eaten is good, then the excreta is comparitively easier to tolerate.
sentences.chinese: 如果喫的是優質食物，那麼排泄物就相對容易忍受。

sentences.english: There are several other excretory mechanisms in earthworms .
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓有好幾種排泄機制。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of metal exposure on defecation behavior in nematode Caenorhabditis elegans.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究重金屬暴露對秀麗線蟲排泄行爲的影響。

sentences.english: Essence of life mounds reach its on face of around mucous membrane, sporadic prostate excretes tubal mouth.
sentences.chinese: 精阜及其附近粘膜面上，有散在的前列腺排泄管開口。

sentences.english: Grow rate according to the illness, kidney excretes a function but abate, do not have a function even.
sentences.chinese: 根據病情發展程度，腎排泄功能可減弱，甚至無功能。

sentences.english: In Japan, the value of your nightsoil varied according to wealth;
sentences.chinese: 在日本，你的排泄物的價值取決於你的財富。

sentences.english: It must be cautiously used for animals with renal dysfunction because of delay of sulfanilamide excretion.
sentences.chinese: 腎功能障礙時，磺胺藥排泄延緩，應慎用。

sentences.english: The color from my red socks ran because I used hot water in the wash.
sentences.chinese: 因爲用熱水洗，所以紅襪子的顏色排泄來了。

sentences.english: who has thousands of cats that pee in your yard.
sentences.chinese: 她養了一大羣貓，這些貓老是在你的院子裏隨意排泄。

definition: variant of 排泄[pai2 xie4]/to excrete (urine, sweat etc)
catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
